insertNodeInto

public void insertNodeInto(javax.swing.tree.MutableTreeNode newChild,
                           javax.swing.tree.MutableTreeNode parent,
                           int index)
This method overwrites the insertNodeInto-method of the DefaultTreeModel in order to insert the model-nodes alphabetically.

Overrides:
insertNodeInto in class javax.swing.tree.DefaultTreeModel
Parameters:
newChild - Node to insert.
parent - ParentNode of the node to insert
index - index, indicating where to insert the node. This index is not evaluated, instead a new index is searched for by lexicographically comparing the User-Object-Strings.
